Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in WWII Japan, covers the famine his family went through, and delves into his Chicago days as a political refugee after the war.
